text.autoconfig.moisturization.title: Moisturization Options
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.gr: Growth is randomly cancelled all but 1/[X] times
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.bo: Growth is randomly cancelled all but 1/[X] times (0 for no bone meal growth at all)
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.fa: The percentage of the speed at which farmland dries out
